duties: As one of the technical implementing units (UPT) under the Human Resources Development Agency of Transportation, the Land Transportation College (STTD) has the duty to organize professional education programs in the field of land transportation.
functions: Organizing the implementation and development of professional education in land transportation
Organizing the implementation of applied technology research in the field of land transportation
Organizing the implementation of research and community service
Managing the library, laboratory, and infrastructure facilities
Fostering the academic community and its relationship with the environment
Managing general, academic, and student administration
